title: 如何设置一个世界不生成怪物？
author: 夏夜浅酌
txt_content:
jsq:
    ==: MVWorld
    hidden: 'false'
    alias: 建设区
    color: DARKAQUA
    style: NORMAL
    pvp: 'true'
    scale: '1.0'
    respawnWorld: ''
    allowWeather: 'true'
    difficulty: HARD
    spawning:
      ==: MVSpawnSettings
      animals:
        ==: MVSpawnSubSettings
        spawn: 'true'
        spawnrate: '-1'
        exceptions: []
      monsters:
        ==: MVSpawnSubSettings
        spawn: 'true'
        spawnrate: '-1'
        exceptions: []
    entryfee:
      ==: MVEntryFee
      amount: '0.0'
      currency: '-1'
    hunger: 'true'
    autoHeal: 'true'
    adjustSpawn: 'true'
    portalForm: ALL
    gameMode: SURVIVAL
    keepSpawnInMemory: 'false'
    spawnLocation:
      ==: MVSpawnLocation
      x: 245.5
      y: 64.0
      z: 207.5
      pitch: 0.0
      yaw: 0.0
    autoLoad: 'true'
    bedRespawn: 'true'
    worldBlacklist: []
    environment: NORMAL
    seed: '5022012555666942803'
    generator: 'null'
    playerLimit: '-1'
    allowFlight: 'true'

这是MV多世界插件，怎么样设置这个世界不生成怪物？

replies.author: 2ZHUO
replies.txt_content:
设置为    monsters:

        ==: MVSpawnSubSettings

        spawn: 'false'

        spawnrate: '-1'

        exceptions: []

replies.author: 夏夜浅酌
replies.txt_content:
2ZHUO 发表于 2018-7-18 00:13
设置为    monsters:

        ==: MVSpawnSubSettings
可以啊！谢谢！
